body:
Comment 5: 
The root cause for this issue was that the OP's environment did not have GOPATH set.
This is sometimes caused (on OS X) by launchd launched processes not having the same
environment as that in the user's shell. 

`go-plus` tries to be nice to users who forget to launch from the terminal,  and
provides a way to still set GOPATH; it was just not working correctly in this instance
(insofar as GOPATH wasn't being set, when it could have been). This has been fixed.
